subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony was good, not great, in the Knicks’ Game 4 loss to the Pacers, but all around him was a Knicks supporting cast that was disintegrating.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony was good, not great, in the Knicks’ Game 4 loss to the Pacers, but all around him was a Knicks supporting cast that was disintegrating.
